Does anyone know of an existing link relation that should be used to
link to an atom feed of a service's "health" (e.g. Amazon status[1])?
I've looked at the various registries (atom, mnot, whatwg, etc.) and
haven't seen anything appropriate yet.

Thanks,
--tim

[1] - http://status.aws.amazon.com/rss/ElasticMapReduce.rss
